exmls.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.HScrollBarSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="8" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="8" width="30" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ScrollerSkin" minWidth="20" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:HScrollBar id="horizontalScrollBar" width="100%" bottom="0"/>
    <e:VScrollBar id="verticalScrollBar" height="100%" right="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.VScrollBarSkin" minWidth="8" minHeight="20" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
    <e:Image id="thumb" source="roundthumb_png" scale9Grid="3,3,2,2" height="30" width="8" horizontalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="GameSceneSkin" width="640" height="1140" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="packetGroup" height="1140" width="640" x="0" y="0" touchChildren="true" touchEnabled="true">
	</e:Group>
	<e:Image id="bag" x="18" y="856" source="bag_png" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:Rect id="timeBg" height="50" width="500" y="61" fillColor="0xF93F4D" anchorOffsetX="250" x="320" touchEnabled="false" touchChildren="false"/>
	<e:Label id="timeLabel" text="20" y="61" width="100" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" size="40" height="50" x="270" touchEnabled="false"/>
	<e:BitmapLabel id="countDownLabel" font="countdown_fnt" text="5" x="290" verticalCenter="-93.5" touchEnabled="false"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="HomeSceneSkin" width="640" height="1140" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="scene1" height="1140" width="640" touchChildren="false" touchEnabled="false" touchThrough="true">
		<e:Image id="guizi0" source="guizi0" x="243" y="279"/>
		<e:Image id="man0" source="man_0" x="167" y="429"/>
		<e:Image id="guizi1" source="guizi1" x="340" y="351"/>
		<e:Image id="guizi2" source="guizi2" x="438" y="423"/>
		<e:Image id="man_talk1" source="man_text1" x="208" y="223"/>
		<e:Group y="520" id="clockGroup" width="332" height="229" x="330" anchorOffsetX="166" anchorOffsetY="114">
			<e:Image source="clockbg_png" y="13" x="13"/>
			<e:BitmapLabel x="249" y="99" text="5" font="clock_fnt" id="progressLabel0"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="scene2" height="1140" width="640" touchThrough="true">
		<e:Group id="godGroup" width="640" height="1140" y="0" x="0">
			<e:Image id="smoke0" source="smoke0" x="176" y="635"/>
			<e:Image id="smoke3" source="smoke3" x="168" y="712"/>
			<e:Image id="smoke1" source="smoke1" x="334" y="633"/>
			<e:Image id="smoke2" source="smoke2" x="312" y="722"/>
			<e:Image source="god_body" x="182" y="624"/>
			<e:Image id="godHead" source="god_head" y="505" x="225"/>
			<e:Image id="godHand" source="god_hand" x="363" y="670" anchorOffsetX="95" anchorOffsetY="50"/>
			<e:Image id="startBtn" source="startbtn" y="880" x="175"/>
			<e:Image id="ruleBtn" source="look_rule" x="227" y="1039"/>
			<e:Image id="godTalk" source="god_text" x="87" y="234"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="door" height="531" width="640" y="300" touchThrough="true" touchEnabled="false" touchChildren="false">
			<e:Image id="doorBg" source="doorbg" y="13" x="70"/>
			<e:Rect id="doorClipMask" height="331" width="499" y="65" x="71"/>
			<e:Group id="doorClip" height="326" width="467" x="89" y="64">
				<e:Image source="door_clip" x="2" y="3"/>
				<e:Image source="door_clip" y="56" x="2"/>
				<e:Image source="door_clip" y="110" x="2"/>
				<e:Image source="door_clip" y="163" x="3"/>
				<e:Image source="door_clip" y="216" x="3"/>
				<e:Image source="door_clip" y="269" x="3"/>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Image id="posDesk" source="pos" y="707" touchEnabled="false"/>
		<e:Image id="man1" source="man_1" y="606" x="190" touchEnabled="false"/>
		<e:Image id="logo" source="logo" y="50" x="75" touchEnabled="false"/>
		<e:Image id="man1_talk" source="man_text0" x="319" y="393" touchEnabled="false"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="PreloadSceneSkin" width="640" height="1140" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Group id="clockGroup" height="229" width="332" x="330" y="520" anchorOffsetX="166" anchorOffsetY="114">
		<e:Image source="clockbg_png" y="13" x="13"/>
		<e:BitmapLabel id="progressLabel" x="249" y="99" font="clock_fnt" text="1"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ResultSceneSkin" width="640" height="1140" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image id="wrongPacket" source="packet_write" x="110" verticalCenter="0" visible="false"/>
	<e:Group id="scoreGroup" height="322" width="640" y="388">
		<e:Image id="textBg00" source="result0_png" y="12" x="71"/>
		<e:Image id="textBg01" source="result2_png" y="13" x="72"/>
		<e:Image id="textBg02" source="result1_png" x="74" y="13"/>
		<e:Image id="textBg1" source="result4_png" x="78" y="149"/>
		<e:Image id="textBg2" source="result_text2" y="195" x="154"/>
		<e:Label id="secLabel" text="10" x="383" y="7" width="86" height="44" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" textColor="0xF00C0C" size="40"/>
		<e:Label id="curScoreLabel" text="123456" x="349" y="58" width="114" textColor="0x000000" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
		<e:Label id="historyScoreLabel" x="245" y="151" textColor="0x000000" text="123456" textAlign="center" width="142" verticalAlign="middle"/>
		<e:Label id="rateLabel" y="184" textColor="0x000000" text="99" textAlign="center" width="94" verticalAlign="middle" x="255" height="62" size="50"/>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="resultGroup" left="0" right="0" top="0" bottom="0">
		<e:Rect id="titleBg" height="126" width="640" x="0" y="0" fillColor="0xE22B2B"/>
		<e:Label text="本游戏由西班牙“叫货宝”倾情呈献" x="0" y="34" width="416" height="56" fontFamily="微软雅黑" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" size="23"/>
		<e:Image id="linkBtn" x="416" y="22" source="downbtn"/>
		<e:Scroller id="rankScroller" width="640" height="480" y="330">
			<e:Group id="scrollerGroup">
				<e:Image id="no1" source="rank1" x="39" y="33"/>
				<e:Image id="no2" source="rank2" x="39" y="140"/>
				<e:Image id="no3" source="rank3" x="39" y="249"/>
				<e:layout>
					<e:BasicLayout/>
				</e:layout>
			</e:Group>
		</e:Scroller>
		<e:Image id="againBtn" source="againbtn" x="93" bottom="58"/>
		<e:Image id="shareBtn" source="sharebtn" x="360" bottom="58"/>
		<e:Image source="look_rule" id="ruleBtn" x="226" bottom="161"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ResultUISkin" width="640" height="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image source="rank_png" x="48" y="3"/>
	<e:Label id="scoreLabel" text="99999" x="403" y="53" width="115" textColor="0xB1600F" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
	<e:Group id="headGroup" height="80" width="80" x="53" y="9">
		<e:Rect id="headMask" height="80" width="80" x="0" y="0"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="RuleUISkin" width="640" height="1140" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Rect fillColor="0xFFD6B8" width="640" height="1140"/>
	<e:Group height="840" width="640" x="0" verticalCenter="2">
		<e:Image source="rule_bg_png" verticalCenter="0.5" x="54"/>
		<e:Image id="closeBtn" source="close" x="546" verticalCenter="-404"/>
		<e:Image id="jiaohuoBtn" source="downbtn" x="214" verticalCenter="280"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version='1.0' encoding='utf-8'?>
<e:Skin class="ShareUISkin" width="640" height="1140" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui">
	<e:Rect height="1140" width="640" fillAlpha="0.7"/>
	<e:Image source="share_png" x="324" y="68"/>
</e:Skin>
